overview: Tour the magnificent Scottish countryside in this musical travelogue while you follow along with the great songs of Scotland. Featuring 16 traditional Scottish songs. Loch Lomond • Wylde Mountain Thyme • Jolly Beggarman • Amazing Grace • Scotland the Brave • Night Visiting Song • Johnny Cope • Dainty Davey • Mairiʼs Wedding • The Skye Boat Song • Rattlinʼ Roaring Willie • Flower of Scotland • Ye Jacobites By Name • Falling of Falkirk • The Willow Tree • Auld Lang Syne
tagline: Tour the magnificent Scottish countryside in this musical travelogue while you follow along with the great songs of Scotland. Featuring 16 traditional Scottish songs.
title: Great Scottish Sing-Along
